original: 久聞將軍威名，寡人降貴紆尊，與<color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color>單挑決勝，汝當知恩！(選擇拒絕將減少我方士氣值200)
text: I have heard of the general's reputation for a long time, and the widows have come to the nobility, and the <color=#b6f8f4>$leader1</color> will be the heads-up winner. (Choose to refuse will reduce our morale by 200)
